scripts.reset: bun run reset:containers && bun run reset:data && bun run reset:db && echo 'Full reset complete'
scripts.reset:containers: docker ps -aq --filter label=pmc.managed=true | xargs docker rm -f 2>/dev/null; docker images -q pmc-openclaw-instance | xargs docker rmi -f 2>/dev/null; echo 'Containers and images removed'
scripts.reset:data: sudo rm -rf ./data/instances && mkdir -p ./data/instances && echo 'Instance data cleared'
